name: jesse squires 🏴 (@jsq@mastodon.social)
summary:
Apple saying they “pay developers” billions each year is like a bank saying they “pay” people that use their ATM. 

It’s our money! From paying customers! 

All Apple did was carry the bag from one place to another, and, in the process, dip their greedy fingers in it. 

Apple does not *pay* us for anything. They give us our own money after extracting a tax.
